conditions.name: Systemic Lupus Erythematosus
conditions.suggestion: Critical: Regular monitoring needed. Common tablets: Hydroxychloroquine (200-400mg), Prednisone (5-60mg) for flares, Mycophenolate (1000-3000mg) for severe cases. NSAIDs like Naproxen (500mg) for pain. Essential: Sun protection, lifestyle changes, folic acid supplements.

conditions.name: Celiac Disease
conditions.suggestion: Important: Strict gluten-free diet essential. Common tablets: Iron supplements (325mg), Vitamin D3 (2000-4000 IU), B12 (1000mcg), Calcium (1000mg), Folic acid (1mg). Regular nutritional monitoring required. Consider probiotic supplements.

conditions.name: Type 1 Diabetes
conditions.suggestion: Critical: Monitor blood sugar 4-10 times daily. Insulin therapy essential. Common tablets: Metformin (500-2000mg) may be added, Glucagon kit for emergencies. Daily aspirin (81mg) may be recommended. Regular A1C monitoring crucial.

conditions.name: Graves' Disease
conditions.suggestion: Important: Regular thyroid monitoring. Common tablets: Methimazole (5-60mg) or Propylthiouracil (50-300mg), Beta blockers like Propranolol (20-40mg) for symptoms. For anxiety: Buspirone (5-10mg) if needed. Monitor heart rate regularly.

conditions.name: Psoriatic Arthritis
conditions.suggestion: Important: Early treatment prevents joint damage. Common tablets: Methotrexate (7.5-25mg weekly), Sulfasalazine (500-1000mg), NSAIDs like Celecoxib (200mg). Newer options: Apremilast (30mg twice daily). Physical therapy essential.
